caption:
The people who are the most alive, driven, and fulfilled are those who lead lives of contribution — they seek to serve, give, and grow.

If you want to tap into that level of purpose and drive, comment “PODCAST” and I’ll send you the full video.

In this special episode of In Search of Excellence with @randallkaplan, we go deep. I share raw stories — from growing up in chaos to the Thanksgiving moment that changed everything and sparked my life’s mission. I open up about lessons learned working as a janitor, the mentors who shaped me — like Jim Rohn — and the mindset shifts that took me out of scarcity and into a life of real, lasting impact.

👇 Comment “Podcast” below to get the link for the full episode!
